Property.name: Str.ProductDisplayName
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1

Property.name: Str.SetupAlreadyRunning
Property.value: Setup.exe is already running.

Property.name: Str.CancelSetupPrompt
Property.value: Are you sure you want to cancel the %s Setup?
Property.comment: if %s is used in the string, it will be replaced with [Str.ProductDisplayName]

Property.name: Str.CouldNotOpenCore
Property.value: The Setup encountered a problem while trying to configure your software. Could not access file: %s Would you like to continue?
Property.comment: string displayed to the user if the core .msi could not be opened during initalization -- %s MUST be in the string, it is replaced with the reason for failure

Property.name: Str.NoFolderAccess
Property.value: Could not access folder: %s
Property.comment: %s is replaced with the folder name

Property.name: Str.PathTooLong
Property.value: The path to the installation directory for %s is limited to a maximum of %s characters. Please select a different destination.
Property.comment: first %s is replaced with [Str.ProductDisplayName] -- second %s is replaced with [MAX_PATH]

Property.name: Str.Initializing.Text
Property.value: Please wait ...

Property.name: Str.Initializing.Text.Cancelling
Property.value: Aborting Operation ...

Property.name: Str.Feature.MainApp
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1

Property.name: Str.Feature.MainApp.Desc
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 delivers powerful software for graphic design, page layout and photo editing.

Property.name: Str.Feature.Utilities.VSTA.Desc.WithVS9
Property.value: This feature installs support for Visual Studio Tools for Applications (if Visual Studio 2008 SP1 is installed).

Property.name: Str.Error.20000
Property.value: The serial number is invalid.

Property.name: Str.Error.30000
Property.value:
IMPORTANT: You cannot install CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 without installing Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0. For information about Microsoft .NET Framework, please visit the Microsoft Web site.
http://www.microsoft.com/NET/

Property.name: Str.Error.30001
Property.value: The processor in your computer does not meet the minimum system requirements for the software. The setup cannot be completed.

Property.name: Str.Error.30002
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 can only be installed on Windows XP and Windows Vista. Setup will now terminate.

Property.name: Str.Error.30003
Property.value: You do not have sufficient privileges to complete this installation. This installation requires administrative, or elevated privileges. Please contact your administrator and then retry this installation.

Property.name: Str.Error.30004
Property.value: IMPORTANT: You cannot install CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 without installing Microsoft .NET Framework 4.0. For information about Microsoft .NET Framework, please visit the Microsoft Web site. 'http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=0a391abd-25c1-4fc0-919f-b21f31ab88b7' - http://www.microsoft.com/NET/

Property.name: Str.Error.30005
Property.value: The 64-Bit version of CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 cannot be installed on a 32-Bit system.

Property.name: Str.UpgradeNotSupported
Property.value: Upgrade serial numbers cannot be used to install via command line. Please input this serial number using the setup interface, or use another serial number in your command line.

Property.name: Str.Error.30500
Property.value: A newer version of this application is already installed on this computer. If you wish to install this version, please uninstall the newer version first.

Property.name: Str.Error.30501
Property.value: You cannot install this trial because CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 is already installed. To install this trial, you must first uninstall the existing product.

Property.name: Str.Error.1638
Property.value: You cannot install this product because another version is already installed. To install this product, you must first uninstall the existing version.

Property.name: Str.CDTS.Prompt
Property.value: CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 has been detected on your computer. Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite X6 offers all the features of CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1—and much more!\n\nClick Cancel if you do not want to upgrade to Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite X6.

Property.name: Str.CDTSTrial.Prompt
Property.value: A trial version of Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite X6 has been detected on your computer. Unless you click Cancel, this trial will be uninstalled and replaced with CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.

Property.name: Str.Error.30502
Property.value: You cannot install this product because another version is already installed.

Property.name: Str.Error.30503
Property.value: To install this product, you must first install CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 and then run the setup again. Visit www.corel.com/draw to download CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1.

Property.name: Str.Error.30504
Property.value: CorelDRAW Essentials and CorelDRAW Home and Student Edition cannot be installed on the same computer. Your system has not been modified. To install the product, you must first uninstall your current CorelDRAW product.

Property.name: Str.Error.30505
Property.value: This product does not match your 32-Bit or 64-Bit version of CorelDRAW Graphics X6. To install the product, choose the matching version, and then run the setup again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30506
Property.value: To install this product, you must first purchase CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6.1 and then run the setup again.

Property.name: Str.Error.35001
Property.value:
Details:
Unable to validate the serial number. An Internet connection is required to complete the installation.

Property.name: Str.Error.30510
Property.value: An Internet connection is required. Please connect to the Internet and try again.

Property.name: Str.Error.30511
Property.value: Error: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please check your Internet connection and try again later.

Property.name: Str.DiskSpace.RequiredString
Property.value: %s required of %s available on drive: %s

Property.value: Removing applications:

Property.value: GPL Ghostscript

Property.value: You must restart your system to continue the installation.\n\nClick Yes to restart now or No if you plan to manually restart later.
